item.title: The Witcher: 8 Best Short Stories
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • The Witcher originated as short stories, defining Geralt's character and building the world.
  • Memorable moments in the stories include Geralt's deal with a djinn and a hunt for a golden dragon.
  • Geralt's encounters with characters like Dudu and Ciri lay the foundation for the iconic saga.

Before becoming a critically acclaimed video game trilogy with award-winning writing, The Witcher started out as a series of short stories by Andrzej Sapkowski. He couldn't have dreamed of the popularity this series would attain after a fledgling Polish video game developer bought the rights to this IP and turned it into one of the most recognizable dark fantasy franchises of all time.

A series of novels followed after the success of Sapkowski's short stories, which helped bring to life the legacy of Geralt and his varied (and powerful) friends. His short stories stand out for their incredible characterization and worldbuilding, detailing several adventures he embarked on that set the stage for many of the novels. These short stories are a blast to experience and show the strong worldbuilding at play in the author's now iconic works.

Spoiler Warning: this list delves into story spoilers from The Last Wish and Sword of Destiny, two short story collections by Andrzej Sapkowski.

8 The Witcher

Features Geralt's Iconic Fight With A Striga

  • Published in: The Last Wish

Most fans of the video game series remember the introductory cinematic of The Witcher , with Geralt taking on a striga and trying to undo its curse. This was an adaptation of one of the most iconic short stories penned by Sapkowski.

To this day, players love the excellent action-packed writing and worldbuilding present in this story, showing off the dark fairytale influences of The Witcher for everyone to see. Geralt's attempts to survive until the morning and undo this curse make for a memorable sight that fans can't get enough of.

7 The Lesser Evil

The Story That Caused Geralt To Be Known As The Butcher Of Blaviken

  • Published in: The Last Wish

Geralt is known by many nicknames, with The White Wolf being a rather flattering way to describe his legacy. However, another nickname that he doesn't care for all that much is the Butcher of Blaviken, attained after he carried out a one-man massacre of his enemies in this town for everyone to see.

Despite technically being in the right and preventing two evil parties from seeing their plans come to fruition, Geralt's attempts to save the townsfolk earned him their derision instead. Witchers were seen as mutated devils, and seeing one cut down numerous people without the context surrounding his actions led to him being thrown out and labeled as the Butcher of Blaviken.

6 A Question Of Price

A Series Of Events That Leads To Ciri Becoming Geralt's Child Of Surprise

  • Published in: The Last Wish

The threat of destiny that tied Geralt and Ciri's fate together appeared after the witcher intervened in the castle of Cintra. During a royal feast, chaos erupts when a cursed man reveals himself to be Pavetta's beloved, causing a chain of events that led to Geralt being requested by Queen Calanthe to sort this mess out.

Eventually, the curse on Duny is dispelled when Pavetta is slated to be wed to him. When the couple asks Geralt what he wants, the witcher surprises everyone by invoking the Law of Surprise, which is soon followed by the revelation that Pavetta is pregnant with a girl who will grow up to become Ciri.

5 The Last Wish

An Encounter With A Djinn Leads To Geralt And Yennefer Being Bound By Destiny

  • Published in: The Last Wish

Geralt and Yennefer's tumultuous relationship is one of the most riveting plotlines in The Witcher series. Both parties met each other in a chance encounter, but it's what Geralt did to thwart Yennefer's plans that tied their fates together for good.

After Yennefer tries to control a djinn's power but fails, Geralt surprises everyone by making the third and last wish after realizing that he was technically the one who uncovered the djinn, not Dandelion. He wishes to bind his fate with Yennefer for good and kickstarts one of the most heated romances in dark fantasy literature.

4 The Bounds Of Reason

A Memorable Hunt For A Golden Dragon

  • Published in: Sword of Destiny

An amazing story that revolves around Geralt joining a caravan hunting down a golden dragon, this mission gives Geralt and Yennefer an excuse to reunite and stoke the flames of romance once again. It helps that encountering the dragon, Villentretenmerth, makes for an imposing moment in the books.

Yennefer's attempts to reverse her infertility by striking a deal with this dragon fail, and she can't help but feel a stinging sense of sorrow at the inability to have a child. Meeting the dragon first in his human form, Borch Three Jackdaws, makes him one of the most interesting characters in the series.

3 Eternal Flame

Depicts Geralt's First Encounter With Dudu

  • Published in: Sword of Destiny

Dudu is a character players must find in Novigrad to bring Geralt one step closer to finding Ciri in The Witcher 3 . Fans of the books know the first instance when this doppler and the White Wolf crossed paths, making for a memorable encounter in this city long before the events of the Witcher games.

Dudu took on the form of a merchant named Dainty and sold his horses to buy goods that were supposedly worthless. However, this turns out to be a stroke of genius when it's revealed that the items Dainty bought will be used in the construction of altars for the Eternal Fire throughout the city. It's a lighthearted story that shows another side of Sapkowski's brutal fantasy world.

2 The Sword Of Destiny

Ciri And Geralt Meet For The First Time In Brokilon

  • Published in: Sword of Destiny

The first time Geralt and Ciri cross paths makes for a memorable story. After seeing a bunch of dead children who ventured too deep into the forest of Brokilon, Geralt is escorted by the dryads residing here to the heart of the forest.

It's here that he meets Ciri for the first time and negotiates her freedom from Brokilon's queen, Eithne. It's a great story, and both characters would have no idea of the thread of destiny that connected them both in their first encounter.

1 Something More

Geralt Tries To Locate Ciri After The Fall Of Cintra

  • Published in: Sword of Destiny

The Fall of Cintra is a tragic moment in the series, with Nilfgaard invading the city and killing the queen to take over. The Battle of Sodden takes place not long after, and Geralt heads to the scene of the carnage to find the child destined to meet him as ordained by the Law of Surprise.

He believes that Ciri is long gone after a fruitless search and heads to a merchant's house, where the family took in a girl lost after the Nilfgaardian invasion. Geralt can't believe his eyes when Ciri comes out, the two running toward each other to share a hug that cements their relationship for good.

item.title: Roblox: Dragon Adventures Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Dragon Adventures Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Dragon Adventures
  • Dragon Adventures Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Dragon Adventures
  • About the Dragon Adventures Developers

Dragon Adventures is a very atmospheric Roblox game that captures players from the first second, all thanks to the well-thought-out gameplay and beautiful graphics. In addition to raising a dragon, players have plenty of other things to do here, ensuring that they'll never get bored. The whole experience can be made even more enjoyable by redeeming codes for Dragon Adventures , all of which can be found below.

Updated November 9, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: If you want a reliable source for redeemable codes, this guide has it all. We update it regularly so you won’t miss out on anything.

All Dragon Adventures Codes

Codes for Dragon Adventures are updated very often, but unfortunately, they can quickly become inactive. Therefore, players should be sure to follow the updates of this article so that they are always aware of the current codes.

Codes Checked on November 9, 2024.

All Working Dragon Adventures Codes

  • JUSTYBLOX - JustyBlox Preset Potion.
  • AESUBREALM - Sub Realm Preset Potion.

How to Redeem Codes in Dragon Adventures

Just like in many other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Dragon Adventures is a really simple affair. To make it even easier, players can follow the step-by-step instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Dragon Adventures .
  • Find the Menu button on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this icon.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Type Here"

Dragon Adventures Tips and Tricks

Below, players can find some tips and tricks for Dragon Adventures :

  • Start by ensuring the dragon is well-fed, as hunger levels below 50 can halt its growth.
  • Equip dragons to accelerate their growth by selecting them in the dragon layer screen and pressing the "Equip" button.
  • Feed the dragon by either clicking the "Feed" button in the dragon lair or pressing the "E" key near the dragon and selecting the apple icon.

Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Dragon Adventures

In case players have finished the game or are already bored with it and are looking for similar alternatives, there is no need to worry. Fans of the game can check below for a list of the best games, like Dragon Adventures :

  • Dragon Blox
  • Dragon Warrior Simulator
  • Dragon Race
  • Your Bizarre Adventure
  • Dragons' Life

About the Dragon Adventures Developers

Dragon Adventures was created by Sonar Studios. But they also have many other successful projects that are listed below:

  • Creatures of Sonaria
  • Feline's Destiny
  • Dino Ranchers
  • Sunny Shores
  • Avian's Destiny
  • Adventure Realms
  • Tasty Farms
  • Dragon Adventures

item.title: Roblox: Devas of Creation Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Devas of Creation Codes
  • How to Codes for Redeem Devas of Creation
  • How to Get More Devas of Creation Codes

Devas of Creation is arguably one of the most well-developed RPGs on Roblox . In addition to the exciting combat system, the game has a large world with various dungeons, secrets, and other activities. As is often the case with this style of game, though, you'll have to look for many different items to progress.

Fortunately, some of these items can be obtained in just a few clicks by using Devas of Creation codes. Each code can be redeemed for useful rewards like Escape Scrolls, Essence Tokens, and Reaction Tokens. With this in mind, fans of this popular Roblox game definitely won't want to miss out on them.

Updated November 9, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Although there is only one active code available right now, we are always on the lookout for new ones and will add them to this guide as soon as they become available. With that in mind, check back in a little while to find more freebies.

All Devas of Creation Codes

Working Devas of Creation Codes

  • DOCCommunityPolls - Redeem this code for rewards.

Expired Devas of Creation Codes

  • DOCHalloween - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCFortuneCode - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOCDungeonCode - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOC115KLikes - Redeem the code to get 3 Blessed Armor Enchant Scrolls, 2 Resurrect Scrolls, 3 Trait Spins, 1 Warehouse Slot and 1 Inventory Slot.
  • WeekendEventBoostRewards - Redeem this code for rewards.
  • DOC110KLikes - Redeem this code for 2x Blessed Armor Enchant Scrolls, 2x Blessed Weapon Enchant Scrolls, and more
  • DOC105KLikes - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOCSpecialRewards - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOC100KLikes - Redeem the code to get rewards
  • DOC95KLikess - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 1 Essential Blazing Shrimp Plate, and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC85KLikess - Redeem the code to get rewards.
  • DevasDiscord175K - Redeem the code to get 2 Resurrect Scrolls, 2 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potions, and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC75KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Essential Blazing Shrimp Plant and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC70KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion and 2 Essential Shielding Elixir
  • DOC65KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Searing Fish Pie
  • DOC55KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 2 Powerful Healing Potion, 2 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Searing Fish Pie
  • DOC45KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, 1 Powerful Mana Potion, and 1 Essential Fortune Nut Mix.
  • DOC40KLikes - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, 1 Blessed Escape Scroll, and 1 Lumbering Mastery Flask.
  • DOC35KLikess - Redeem the code to get 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Armor Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, and 1 Cooking Mastery Flask.
  • DOC30KLikess - Redeem the code to get 3500 Essence Tokens, 1 Resurrect Scroll, 1 Weapon Enchant Scroll, 1 Mining Mastery Flask, and 1 Crafting Mastery Flask.
  • DOC100K - Redeem code to get Essential Enchanted Nectar, 3500 Essence Tokens, Resurrect Scroll, and 100 Faction Tokens.
  • DevasReleaseCode - Redeem code to get Essential Swift Meat Omelette, 2000 Essence Tokens, Crafting Mastery Flask, and 2 Escape Scrolls.
  • DOC20KLikes - Redeem code to get a Crafting Mastery Flask, 3500 Essence Tokens, Weapon Enchant Scroll, Resurrect Scroll, and Essential Enchanted Nectar.
  • JoinedDOCGroup - Redeem code to get Resurrect Scroll, 2000 Essence Tokens, and Cooking Mastery Flash. (You must join the Devas Of Creation Roblox group to redeem.)
  • FollowDevasDiscord - Redeem code to get Essential Swift Meat Omelette, 3500 Essence Tokens, Escape Scroll, and 100 Faction Tokens.

How to Codes for Redeem Devas of Creation

Fortunately, using codes in Devas of Creation is no more difficult than it is in other Roblox games. This feature is available from the very beginning of the game, as soon as you complete the tutorial. For convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • First, launch the Devas of Creation experience on Roblox .
  • Next, complete the short tutorial if you haven't done so already.
  • Once you start the story, click on the gear icon in the upper-left corner of the screen and select the Codes option.
  • Finally, enter the code in the corresponding box and click Redeem to claim your rewards.

How to Get More Devas of Creation Codes

Now that you know about some of the rewards that Devas of Creation codes can offer, you'll probably want to know how to get more of them. Similar to other Roblox games, to do this, players should follow the developers' official pages. There, you'll not only find codes, but also news about upcoming updates and events.

  • Devas of Creation X page
  • Devas of Creation Discord server
  • Devas of Creation Roblox group

item.title: Call Of Duty Black Ops 6: Tips For Hardcore Mode
item.description:
In keeping with the series prior, Call of Duty Black Ops 6 offers players a strong handful of games modes to dive into with the multiplayer mode. Most of these carry the same elements from previous titles: mini-map to show player locations, ammo count, what weapon a person has at the moment. Sometimes, however, people want a more stripped down experience where quick reflexes mean much more and there is more of a threat to survival at any given moment. That's where the Hardcore mode comes into play, offering the players something a little more intense than usual.

In this mode, the HUD is vastly reduced. The mini-map is gone unless a team has a UAV active, and everyone's health is significantly reduced. This makes the time to kill much shorter. There is even friendly fire activity, so accuracy plays a more important role. It's a much more intense way of playing the game, where a wrong shot can lead to a loss very quickly . Because of that, there are some tips that players need to carry with them as they start playing in these mods.

Use Smaller Score Streaks

Kills are going to be a little tougher to come across in Hardcore mode, especially when you are just starting out. Because of this, players should look to use the lower score streaks from the list; i.e. the ones that cost less to unlock .

Without the mini-map being present at all times , it's important to have a UAV as much as possible. This will greatly help a team as they try to win in these modes. It makes more sense to use what people are most likely going to use more.

Take It Slower

The usual style of play in these games is to run as fast as possible, pulling off quick-scope shots that down an enemy before they can react. But when it comes to the Hardcore game modes, things need to go a little differently — and slowly.

Taking time is more prudent than being as fast as possible . Of course, reactions still need to be razor sharp, but when a person can be killed much more quickly than usual, not running around corners means not being gunned down by an enemy, or even a teammate.

Think Before Shooting

In keeping with the previous tip, players shouldn't have as happy of a trigger finger as usual. This is because of the friendly fire that exists in Hardcore modes . Taking a second to register what person is coming around the corner means not shooting a teammate.

Being a little more loose with the trigger finger works in the normal modes because there is no friendly fire, so accidentally firing at a teammate won't kill them . That changes in Hardcore, and can be a problem for players if they're not careful.

Use More Weapons

There is always a meta in Call of Duty, with certain guns being more popular among the playerbase. This is usually because of damage output or accuracy , which makes certain weapons better than others.

However, in Hardcore mode, players' health is reduced, which means players can use guns that might not be the most popular option. This leads to more experimentation and fun . Instead of feeling like you have to go with a certain group of weapons, you can branch out and have more fun.

Always Check Your Corners

With more at stake in Hardcore mode, other players are going to be doing whatever they can to claim victory . This means they may be using some unsavory strategies that not many people are going to be happy about, like camping.

Hardcore mode, unfortunately, is full of campers. Checking corners before going into a room is going to make a big difference between life and death . It's just the truth of the matter, and something that people need to keep in mind when playing this mode.

item.title: If Batman Existed in the Pokemon Universe
item.description: He is vengeance... He is the knight... He is ZUBATMAN!
